entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly app lifecycle event in MainLayout or App never gets called #36861
  • Type mismatches between parameter and route constraints not caught #36859
  • Update WiX package dependency #36854
  • Results.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #36848
    6.0-rc2
  • Static web assets not being included with NuGet package #36847
  • Add support for configurable log level #36841
  • After migrating to .NET 6 RC 1 No service for type Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration can be found #36829
    6.0-rc2
  • [Hot Reload] Source Generator Based Error Breaks Hot Reload #36825
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Verify new roslyn overload resolution changes don't break minimal API scenarios #36776
    6.0.0
  • Xamarin iOS: SignalR nuget package throws MissingMethodException #36763
  • Wrong diagnostic reported in nested nested C#/HTML scenarios #36124
    17.0-Preview5
  • BlazorWasm IdentityServer fetch rejects clients in Production #36812
    6.0.0
  • blazor = RenderFragment + MarkupString #36714
  • Hot Reload is not working at in Blazor wasm hosted app #36851
  • HealthCheck fails when using MapDynamicControllerRoute and DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36840
  • RequestDelegateFactory should produce clear errors for invalid Delegates #30322
    6.0-rc2
  • Examine Yarn.MSBuild for performance issues #22723
  • Remove continueOnBuildError for components e2e #35565
    6.0.0
  • Change default DateTime/TimeOnly/DateOnly parsing logic to use UTC #36725
    6.0-rc2
  • Building tag 5.0.10 fails installing dotnet #36834
  • Blazor, methods not called after moving to another page, no errors in console also #36811
  • Check your `.csproj` file. I had the exact same problem, when I had the following in my `.csproj`: #36837
  • New Project Dialog in VS2022: Language filter dropdown should NOT contain Angular/React/Vue #36800
  • Disable _content Static Web Assets Generation #36761
  • Dotnet Watch Net 6 Preview 5: The model item passed into the ViewDataDictionary is of type X but this ViewDataDictionary instance requires a model item of type X. #33636
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: fortunes_nodejs #36722
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36737
  • Perf regression: json #36789
  • .Net 6 rc1 trimmer breaks WASM Azure AD Auth #36830

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WiX to signed build #36865
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Add the ConfigurationManager to the IServiceCollection (#36832) #36864
    area-runtime
  • Bump ansi-regex from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36863
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • Always download blazor-hotreload.js from app root #36862
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36860
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36858
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve Results.Problem and Results.ValidationProblem APIs #36856
    area-web-frameworks
  • Avoid creating list for single endpoint #36852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update test matrix #36845
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions closure #36828
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • `<TargetFrameworks />` -> `<TargetFramework />` #36727
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add the ConfigurationManager to the IServiceCollection #36832
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Update ModelMetadata.cs #36853
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport `Blazor Stop Requiring `unsafe-inline` in CSP (#36771)` #36846
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Fix .NET Docker image used in Codespaces #36843
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] onBoard package validation #36751
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [main] Use Swagger defaults in web API controllers template #36826
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Parse date types into UTC by default (#36762) #36844
    7.0-preview1
  • Remove continueOnBuildError for components E2E tests. Fixes #35565 #36839
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36657
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove continueOnBuildError for components E2E tests. Fixes #35565 #36842
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Switch to 1ES R&D Pools on main #36820
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Use Swagger defaults in web API controllers template #36816
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-templates, feature-minimal-actions

Updated

  • Blazor Server Add Console Error if Long Polling #36764
    area-blazor
  • Add MapPatch API to endpointRouteBuilderExtensions #36818
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update sdk to 6.0.100-rc.2.21470.55 #36783
    area-infrastructure
  • Add more details about helix payload #36665
    area-infrastructure
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Include system crash dumps in artifacts #36824
    area-infrastructure
